DOC.brief_summary: The Foley catheter is one component in a catheter insertion procedure that could contribute to a catheter associated urinary tract infection (CAUTI). Improvements in the catheter insertion procedure using the ERASE CAUTI Tray system may help to lower these infection rates.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Compare CAUTI Rates Following ERASE CAUTI Tray Silver vs Silver Coated Foley Catheters
DOC.criteria: At least 18 years of age Received either silver coated Foley catheter or ERASE CAUTI silver coated catheter UTI present upon current hospital admission Burn patients, transplant patients, or immunecompromised patients.
